page.title: 16RETIREMENT IN COLWYN BAY
page.content: Colwyn Bay is predominantly a retirement area with over forty homes catering for the elderly.Colwyn Bay is attractive to senior citizens as it offers the following: a) Healthy sea air b) Mild climate c) Beautiful countryside d) Ease of access by train and new road e) Good facilities and accommodation f) Level walk to town centre. Some pupils visited Guys Cliffe home for the elderly.It caters for 18 residents in two linked houses situated a short walk from the town centre.All of the residents were very happy to be living in Colwyn Bay and said that they would be upset if they had to move away.They also thought that most recent changes in the town made it a better place to live.
